kodkod.ast.operator
Enum IntOperator

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Enum<IntOperator>
      kodkod.ast.operator.IntOperator
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Comparable<IntOperator>
public enum IntOperator
extends Enum<IntOperator>

Enumerate unary (-, ~, abs, sgn), binary (+, *, &, |, -, /, %, >>, >>>, <<) and nary (+, *, &, |) operators on integer expressions.

invariant:
all args: seq IntExpression, out: IntExpression | args->out in op => (out.children = args && out.op = this)
specfield:
op: (int->lone IntExpression) -> IntExpression
